events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated in several days.
The reported issue regarding the delayed shipment was categorized under Delivery Delay for further handling.
A customer service agent has been assigned to assist with the delayed delivery case.
Hello! I’m here to assist you with your order delay. Let’s look into the shipment status together.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code so I can check the latest updates for you?
Sure, my order number is 982374, and the tracking code is TRK123456789. The tracking hasn’t changed since last week.
I have contacted the shipping provider, and they confirmed the package is delayed due to unexpected logistic issues. We expect it to arrive within 3 business days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the info; I’ll wait a few more days and let you know if it still doesn’t arrive.
Your package should now be delivered shortly according to the latest update. Please contact us again if you experience further delays.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived. We hope everything is as expected with your delivery.
Yes, the package finally arrived yesterday. Everything is perfect, thank you for your help!
We’re glad your package arrived and the issue is resolved. Closing this case now, have a great day!
We have sent you a survey to gather feedback about your support experience. Your opinion matters to us.
